sentences.en: At first blush, this probably seems swell , since the alternative - ostensibly - is layoffs.
sentences.cn: 乍一看, 表面不裁员而采用其他方式这一举措似乎很不错.

sentences.en: But fellow members of Egypt ostensibly secular judiciary have proved harder to convince.
sentences.cn: 然而,已经证实:属于世俗[而非宗教的]埃及男性法官们却难以接受.

sentences.en: He did it ostensibly for love, but really for money.
sentences.cn: 他这样做表面上是为了爱情, 实际上却是为了金钱.

sentences.en: Is there another motive for the ostensibly philanthropic venture?
sentences.cn: 在这表面上的善事背后,是否有其他的目的 呢 ?

sentences.en: Ostensibly a consular employee, he is actually a spy.
sentences.cn: 他表面上是领事馆雇员, 实为情报人员.

sentences.en: She ripped off a leather jacket while ostensibly trying on clothes.
sentences.cn: 她装模作样试穿衣服时偷了一件皮夹克.

sentences.en: She stayed behind at the office, ostensibly to work.
sentences.cn: 她留在办公室里不走，假装要工作。
